title: Analytics REST API (deprecated)
content:
This section provides specifications for Analytics REST services APIs. All Analytics REST Services URIs must conform to the following format:

<scheme://maas-address>/rest/<tenant>/analytics/[record-name]?filter

This analytics REST API doesn't query IDOL. It directly calls the EMS API to query records and its query format is therefore the same as that of the EMS API. The Analytics REST API uses the same protocols defined for the EMS APIs in REST API collection query protocol.

The only difference between the two REST APIs is that there's no limit on the number of query results returned by the analytics query API, whereas the query size of EMS API ranges from 4,000 to 100,000, which is controlled by a tenant setting in Suite Administration: MAX_EMS_RECORDS_PER_QUERY (the default value is 10,000). 

The Analytics REST API may be a choice if you want to get more than 100,000 results per query; however, the performance may be poor. For this reason, the analytics REST API is deprecated and may be obsoleted in a future release. You can use OData instead. For details, see Use OData for BI integration.
